original_title: On Tour: Big Sandy & His Fly Rite Boys
overview: Rockabilly Hall of Fame band, Big Sandy & His Fly Rite Boys, performed their rockabilly, rock & roll, honky-tonk, R&B, soul and doo-wop music around the world many times in the past 25 years. This rockin’ quartet is often considered torch bearers of American roots music. In this episode, we explore the plethora of song elements in their vast category and experience the inspirations of the man behind the band, “Big Sandy”. On Tour is a music and performance program recorded live on location at local venues in PA, NJ & DE.
title: On Tour: Big Sandy & His Fly Rite Boys
